description:
Offices in Charleston, WV, Summersville, WV, and Atlanta, GA

Bailey, Javins & Carter, L.C., has an office in Summersville in order to serve West Virginia residents who need legal representation in personal injury, workers' compensation and wrongful death claims. Our attorneys understand the impact a catastrophic accident can have on your life, and the last thing you need to worry about is how you will pay your bills and move forward financially. We have helped people just like you throughout the state with claims arising from the following:

• Birth injuries

• Spinal cord injuries

• Brain injuries

• Amputations

• Burn injuries

• Back and neck injuries

• Disfigurement and scarring

Suffering from any of the above injuries will more than likely change your and your family's lives forever. It doesn't matter whether you suffered such injuries in a work-related accident or as the victim in a motor vehicle crash or some other accident. We will work diligently to obtain the compensation you deserve.

Losing a loved one to an accident or illness can have a devastating effect on you and your family as well, especially if he or she was the primary income earner in the household. Our law firm understands that nothing can replace your loved one, but our attorneys will work diligently to help you pursue a claim for the inevitable financial losses that accompany such a tragedy.

With decades of combined experience and knowledge, our law firm can give you an honest assessment of your situation and let you know what legal options would put you in position for the best possible outcome to your claim. When you need competent and compassionate legal representation due to an injury or illness caused by the recklessness or negligence of someone else, contact Bailey, Javins & Carter, L.C., by calling our office or visiting our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
